name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: Good price, good brand & are very comfortable and very light to wear.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 March 2024

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: These shoes are versatile- good for walking or running or other kinds of sport, theyâ€™re comfortable and quite lightweight, I run in these but Iâ€™d say there are better running shoes. Iâ€™ve had in the past. Although Iâ€™d buy another pair in a different colour. Maybe the black and white or grey. They fit me well and the white colour I got looks nice. Better than any of the photos advertised really. They do stain easily but as long as you clean them straight away when you get home itâ€™s alright. Theyâ€™re quite bendy and give a sort of boost when you jump in them which is nice. Good shoes
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 October 2023

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: Good quality. Comfortable. Not bad value. Look good.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 February 2024

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: I bought these as a punt. I saw the price and knew that it would be very difficult to find a proper running shoe for under Â£100 / $150 (actually for running). The inner cushioning is okay 7/10. Not as good as my actual running shoes made by Puma. The outer is much stiffer 6/10. So, what are you buying these for? If you want running shoes, buy an actual pair of good high technology running shoes, and expect to pay 3 times this easily. You wont injure yourself with good proper runners gear. Your knees wont hurt as much from every impact, and you will be less likely to get shin splints. You will be more likely to actually get fit, because you won't stop from daily aches and occasional hard impact injuries. But ... If you want comfortable shoes for daily urban walks, these are fantastic. The price is amazing for just comfortable daily non-running workouts.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 29 December 2023

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: Got these for my upcoming holiday, nice and comfy, good fit (11) colour is good and about Â£80 cheaper than other colours, bargain
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 January 2024

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: Bought for my son, he said they were very comfy true to size. All in all a great trainer
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 26 February 2024

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: OK true size
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 March 2024

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
review: The Under Armour running shoes proved to be an excellent choice for my son. Their sleek design and comfortable fit immediately caught his attention, and he's been thoroughly impressed with their performance during his runs. The shoes offer reliable support and cushioning, providing the comfort needed for longer distances. The durability of the materials used is noteworthy, holding up well to the wear and tear of an active lifestyle. As a parent, I appreciate the brand's commitment to quality, and my son is genuinely happy with his Under Armour running shoes â€“ a solid investment for any young, active individual.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 10 November 2023

name: Under Armour Surge 3 Mens Running Shoes
